Default.OnPaneInit:
(block (xp desc) ; Initialize (if (not (objGetData gSource "XP")) (objSetData gSource "XP" 0) ) (setq xp (objGetData gSource "XP"))
; Description (switch (ls xp 50) (setq desc (cat "The lab is filled with racks of equipment; researchers are testing various new weapons here.

" "Sitting by the corner, a small stocky man mumbles to himself as he pours through dozens of screen of information. " "His name is Dvalin, the chief scientist for the Rasiermesser Corporation." ))
(ls xp 250) (setq desc (cat "The center of the lab has a massive testing area; a segment of armor on a static frame is being subjected to intense energies.

" "Dvalin walks over to you and points to the test: "Dat is my new nano-sintered armor. It will be twice as strong as hexphase, ya? It will be done soon!"" ))
(ls xp 500) (setq desc (cat "One side of the lab has a static frame holding a complex weapon; scientists and engineers work on it under Dvalin's direction.

" "Dvalin walks over to you: "It is my new project, ya? An ion weapon as powerful as a howitzer!"" ))
(setq desc (cat "The center of the lab has a massive testing area; a dangerous-looking weapon attached to a static frame burns a hole in a sample of blast plate.

" "Dvalin walks over to you and points at the test: "Vat do you think? Impressive, ya? Much better than Akan!" )) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Actions.Action:
(block (haveDamaged haveUndamaged gain haveCount)
; See if we've already got the item that the player donated (setq haveCount 0) (enum (objGetItems gSource "aswU +NotForSale; F:rv-;") theItem (if (eq (itmGetType theItem) (itmGetType gItem)) (block Nil (setq haveCount (add haveCount (itmGetCount gItem))) (if (itmIsDamaged theItem) (setq haveDamaged True) (setq haveUndamaged True) ) ) ) )
; Figure out how valuable this item is to Dvalin (setq gResult True) (switch (and (not haveDamaged) (not haveUndamaged)) (if (itmIsDamaged gItem) (block Nil (setq gain (multiply 5 (itmGetLevel gItem))) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is impressed: \"Gods! " (itmGetName gItem 0x0005) "! A pity it is not intact, ya?\"")) ) (block Nil (setq gain (multiply 10 (itmGetLevel gItem))) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is ecstatic: \"Gods! I have not seen " (itmGetName gItem 0x0004) " before! It is in excellent condition, ya?\"")) ) )
(and (not haveUndamaged) (not (itmIsDamaged gItem))) (block Nil (setq gain (multiply 7 (itmGetLevel gItem))) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is very pleased: \"At last! An undamaged " (itmGetName gItem 0x0000) "! It is in excellent condition, ya?\"")) )
(gr haveCount 5) (block Nil (setq gain 0) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is uninterested: \"Another one, ya? We will use it for balast, perhaps.\"")) (setq gResult Nil) )
(or (not haveDamaged) (not (itmIsDamaged gItem))) (block Nil (setq gain (multiply 2 (itmGetLevel gItem))) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is pleased: \"Good work! This " (itmGetName gItem 0x0000) " will be analyzed with the others.\"")) )
(block Nil (setq gain (multiply 1 (itmGetLevel gItem))) (setq gTitle (cat "Dvalin is not very interested: \"Another one, ya? Put it over there; we will analyze it.\"")) ) )
; Increase XP (objIncData gSource "XP" gain)
; Transfer the item (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) (objAddItem gSource gItem 1) (objSetData gSource "offered" True)
; Done (scrShowScreen gScreen "Reward") )

(block (minXP xp roll) ; We double to xp required after each gift (setq xp (objGetData gSource "XP")) (setq minXP (multiply (objGetData gSource "giftXP") 2)) (if (ls minXP 150) (setq minXP 150) )
; Figure out what kind of gift to give (setq roll (random 1 100))
(switch (or (not gResult) (ls xp minXP)) (setq gItem Nil)
(geq xp 2400) (setq gItem Nil)
(geq xp 1500) (switch (leq roll 50) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinNanoArmor; 4) 0x010a)) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinFluidArmor; 4) 0x0200)) )
(geq xp 1200) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate (random (list &itDvalinIon9Cannon; &itDvalinPositron9Cannon; &itDvalinPositronAccelerator; &itDvalinPlasmaRepeater; &itDvalinPteracniumCannon;)) 1) (random (list 0x0108 0x0109 0x010a)) ) ) )
(geq xp 1000) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinAdvancedReflexArmor; 4)) )
(geq xp 800) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate (random (list &itKilotonBurst; &itDvalinCrippler; &itDvalinGraser; &itDvalinTritiumMinigun; &itDvalinCasabaHowitzer; &itDvalinOmniTritiumCannon;)) 1)) )
(geq xp 600) (block Nil (switch (leq roll 20) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinFaradayArmor; 4)) (leq roll 40) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinArmor; 4)) (leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinRegenerativeCeralloy; 4))
(setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinLightTransuranicArmor; 4))
))
(geq xp 500) (block Nil (switch (leq roll 30) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinBugZapper; 1))
(leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinParticle9Cannon; 1))
(setq gItem (itmCreate &itDvalinIonHowitzer; 1)) ) )
(geq xp 300) (switch (leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itAkan600Turret; 1) 0x0105))
(leq roll 90) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itAkan600Turret; 1) 0x0107))
(setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itAkan600Turret; 1) 0x1003)) )
(geq xp 200) (switch (leq roll 30) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinAkan90; 1) 0x0107)) (leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinAkan90; 1) 0x0105))
(leq roll 90) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinAkan270; 1) 0x0107))
(setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinAkan270; 1) 0x1003)) )
(geq xp 150) (switch (leq roll 30) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinReflexArmor; 4) 0x010a)) (leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinReflexArmor; 4) 0x010a)) (leq roll 90) (setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itDvalinAblativePlate; 4) 0x0349))
(setq gItem (itmSetEnhanced (itmCreate &itAdvancedCeralloyArmor; 4) 0x0200)) )
(setq gItem Nil) )
; Give the gift (if gItem (block Nil (objAddItem gPlayerShip gItem) (objSetData gSource "giftXP" minXP) (scrShowPane gScreen "Gift") ) (scrShowScreen gScreen "ResearchLab") ) )
